login.title: Smite
login.subtitle: Tunnel Management Platform
login.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Overview of your system status and resources

nodes.title: Nodes
nodes.subtitle: Manage your tunnel nodes
nodes.deleteNode: Are you sure you want to delete this node?
nodes.caInstruction: Copy the certificate below (click "Copy Certificate" button). During node installation, you will be prompted to paste this certificate.
nodes.failedToCopy: Failed to copy to clipboard. Please copy manually.
nodes.certificateEmpty: Certificate content is empty. Please wait for it to load.

servers.title: Slaves
servers.subtitle: manage your slave servers
servers.noServers: No slave servers found. Add a server to get started.
servers.deleteServer: Are you sure you want to delete this server?
servers.caInstruction: Copy the certificate below (click "Copy Certificate" button). During slave server installation, you will be prompted to paste this certificate.
servers.failedToCopy: Failed to copy to clipboard. Please copy manually.
servers.certificateEmpty: Certificate content is empty. Please wait for it to load.

tunnels.title: Tunnels
tunnels.subtitle: Manage your tunnel connections
tunnels.deleteTunnel: Are you sure you want to delete this tunnel?
tunnels.clientConnectPort: Port where clients connect to access tunneled service
tunnels.v4ToV6Description: Enable this to create a tunnel from IPv4 (panel) to IPv6 (node/target). Panel listens on IPv4, target uses IPv6.

mesh.title: WireGuard Mesh
mesh.subtitle: Site-to-site VPN mesh networks over FRP
mesh.createFirstMesh: Create your first WireGuard mesh to connect multiple locations
mesh.applyMeshConfirm: Apply mesh configuration to all nodes?
mesh.rotateKeysConfirm: Rotate WireGuard keys? You will need to re-apply the mesh after rotation.
mesh.rotateSuccess: Keys rotated successfully. Please re-apply the mesh.
mesh.deleteMeshConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this mesh? This will remove all WireGuard configurations from nodes.
mesh.selectNodesDesc: Both Master nodes and Slave servers can participate in the mesh
mesh.nodesUseOverlayIPs: Nodes will use their assigned overlay IPs.
mesh.noIPAMPool: No IPAM pool configured. Please create an overlay pool first.
mesh.fullMesh: Full Mesh (all nodes connect to each other)
mesh.hubSpoke: Hub-Spoke (all nodes connect to first node)
mesh.udpOnly: UDP only (lower latency, better for real-time)
mesh.tcpOnly: TCP only (more reliable, better for restrictive networks)
mesh.bothTCPUDPDesc: Creates both TCP and UDP tunnels for redundancy and better connectivity
mesh.wireguardPortDesc: Custom port for WireGuard local_port and remote_port. Leave empty for random port. Both ports will use the same value.

overlay.title: Overlay IP Management
overlay.subtitle: Manage overlay IP addresses for nodes
overlay.createPoolDesc: Create an overlay IP pool to start assigning IPs to nodes
overlay.deletePoolConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the overlay pool? This will remove all IP assignments.
